Seller's Description and Comments :: 354 :: One Owner!!!! Talk about luxury!!!! Stunning!!!! Who could say no to a simply outstanding car, like this superb 2008 Volvo S80? It's gonna be hard to make a quiet entrance with this stylish and luxurious ride, so make sure your hair looks good before you step out, because everybody WILL be watching. Tri County Ford has been proudly serving the Kentuckiana area for over 27 years. We are family owned and operated, and we believe in a NO HASSLE sales experience. We price all of our vehicles at a competitive price. We believe that your time is valuable and that you have better things to do with your time than negotiate back and forth over an inflated price. We set high standards for the quality of pre-owned cars and trucks that we stock. We dont just stock anything!!!! All of our pre-owned inventory must meet our stringent requirements, unlike many dealers. All the pre-owned vehicles have undergone a thorough inspection from our service department before being priced for sale. We have a great selection of value priced Ford factory program vehicles, trade-in and Ford Certified pre-owned cars and trucks. Call Tri County Ford at 1-800-945-2520 or stop in for a test drive. Big city selection at small town prices!!!! We hope to earn your business. :: 355 :: Please call ahead or email us to make sure the vehicle in which you are interested is still available at the advertised price. :: 356 :: 	Disclaimer :: 357 :: 	Sales Tax, Title, License Fee, Registration Fee, Dealer Documentary Fee and Finance Charges are additional to the advertised price. Tri County Ford has been proudly serving the Kentuckiana area for over 27 years. We are family owned and operated, and we believe in a NO HASSLE sales experience. Power and Associates gave the 2008 Camry 5 out of 5 Power Circles for Overall Initial Quality. Tri County Ford has been proudly serving the Kentuckiana area for over 27 years. Radio :: 365 :: Seller's Description and Comments :: 366 :: Buick's Flagship! This 2009 Buick Enclave is roomy and comfortable, it seats seven or eight. It has a nice, smooth ride, and its modern V6 engine provides smooth power and good fuel economy for a vehicle this size...'' With features such as AM/FM radio, AM/FM Stereo w/CD Player & MP3 Playback, CD player, MP3 decoder, Radio data system, XM Radio, Air conditioning, Front dual zone A/C, Rear air conditioning, Memory seat, Power driver seat, Power passenger seat, Power steering, Steering wheel mounted audio controls, Wireless connectivity, ABS brakes, Dual front impact airbags, Dual front side impact airbags, Four wheel independent suspension, Low tire pressure warning, Occupant sensing airbag, Overhead airbag, Panic alarm, Rear anti-roll bar, Security system, Automatic temperature control, Delay-off headlights, Front fog lights, Fully automatic headlights, High intensity discharge headlights, Speed control, Auto-dimming rearview mirror, Electronic stability, Heated door mirrors, Power door mirrors, Power trunk closing assist, Rear window defroster, Rear window wiper, Remote keyless entry, Roof rack: rails only, Spoiler, Telescoping steering wheel, Tilt steering wheel, Turn signal indicator mirrors, Variably intermittent wipers, 3rd row seats: split-bench, Driver door bin, Driver vanity mirror, Front center armrest: w/storage, Front reading lights, Garage door transmitter, Heated front seats, Outside temperature display, Power windows, Rear reading lights, Rear seat center armrest, Trip computer, 7-Passenger Seating w/2nd Row Captain's Chairs, Leather Seating Surfaces, 19'' x 7.5'' Machined Aluminum (4), 3.16 Axle Ratio, and Front beverage holders. Call Tri County Ford at 1-800-945-2520 or stop in for a test drive. Big city selection at small town prices!
